data.text: @LaurenceWreford Hola Laurence, please send us a DM with more details about what happened so we can check more information from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@DaviSense Davis, please check your DM. Regards.

@DaviSense Hola Davis, we are sorry to hear this. Did you open a claim at the airport? If so, please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1UII) with the PIR number and full name so we can verify. We remain at your disposal, regards.
@GerryakaTracey Thank you Tracey, we will continue the conversation there. Kind regards
@marzeena Hola Marge, please send us a DM with the details of your voucher and the booking you were trying to issue so we can have a look and assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@jazmin_maitret Hola Jazmin, hemos respondido tu otro comentario, aguardamos tu md, saludos cordiales
@jazmin_maitret Hola Jazmin, ¿que aerolínea fue la última en operar el vuelo?, ¿tienes un número PIR asignado?, ¿nos aclaras?

@GerryakaTracey Hola Tracey, nuts are not removed from sale, however, a note can be added to your booking to inform of this to the flight crew. If you are allergic and already have booked with us, please send us a DM so we can assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@Xacuti123 Hola Joe, please send us a DM with the details of your booking and your ticket number so we can have a look and assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@ErimelT Hola Erimel, ahora revisamos internamente y damos seguimiento a tu md, un saludo

@umo44ka111 Hola Ivan, we would like you to indicate the reason for your query by DM to verify how to assist you and give you a better answer. We look forward to your response, regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@ca10024947 Hola, at the moment we do not have a response from our colleagues, as we have indicated we have scaled the case to speed up this process. We remain attentive to news, regards

@Pocoumano Hola Deeksha, we would like you to tell us if you have a case number in relation to your claim, in this way we should be able to review the status of your case, we wait for your response by DM. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@Madelonos we have continued to expand the vouchers so that our users can make use of them. In the same way we inform you that the vouchers are not nominative so anyone can make use of them. We remain at your disposal, best regards. /2

@Madelonos Hola Madelon, we understand that you are referring to the refund of your voucher. In this case we remind you that the vouchers can not be refunded to the original form of payment once they have been issued so we could not process your request in this regard, /1
@eeeeebcux Cocolatina, we are sorry we don´t have any update about your case; however, we have already left a new comment to our colleagues,  so they can send us the updates as soon as possible.
@svenja_9393 Hola Svenja, we are sorry to hear this. Please send us all the details of what happened through a DM https://t.co/R34zzY1UII; we remain at your disposal, kind regards.
@BuckeyeTap Hola, we will consult this internally with the area in charge. As soon as we have any details we will get back to you, Regards
@KingMufasah Hola, from social media we do not know the details of the case, please let us know exactly what was the reason for your call, in order to assist you from here about the process. Regards
@KingMufasah Hola, if you have a query regarding a reservation or claim let us know more details in order to assist you. Regards
@superleeds9999 We understand that this process is carried out by the airport directly, we hope you receive your luggage as soon as possible. Kind regards.
@superleeds9999 Hello, Joe. We are sorry for the inconvenience that may have arisen. If we can help anything from here, please let us know. Kind regards.
@AnneF60 Hola Anne. We have replied to your DM. Regards.
@lilpepperoniii Sorry to read this. We've sent you a new DM. Please check
@lilpepperoniii Hola, we're sorry to read this and have just replied to your DMs. Please check
@richard_coxon You're welcome :)
@richard_coxon Hola Richard, sorry for the inconvenience. We've just replied to your DMs. Best regards

data.text: @Billyrichard72 At our site https://t.co/m6fyDz8Iba we sell tickets for flights operated by partner airlines as well, like Vueling, Level, American Airlines, British Airways, Aer Lingus and LATAM, for example. The information was available during the purchase process at our site. Best regards

data.text: @Billyrichard72 Sorry to read this. If you want to submit a complaint about the flight experience, please contact Vueling directly, since they operated your flight. The information about which airline will operate the flight is given during the ticket purchase process at https://t.co/m6fyDyQyX2
@AmandaM90946822 O valor corresponde à compensação por estar mais de 21 dias sem bagagem.
@NatashaHallam11 Thank you for the information Natasha, we have replied your DM. Regards

@NatashaHallam11 Hola Natasha, we are sorry for the inconvenience with your delayed baggage, could you please give us all detail by DM including your PIR code to verify the information? Thanks in advancde https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@rb2676 Hola, we've just replied to your DMs. Please check

data.text: @Billyrichard72 Hola, sorry to read this. Unfortunately, Vueling isn't an OW Alliance member airline, therefore, the benefits don't apply when flying with them. The information about which airline will operate the flight is displayed during the ticket purchase process at our site. Kind regards

@AmandaM90946822 Hola Amanda, desculpe-nos pelo inconveniente. Nossos colegas finalizaram a análise do seu caso e emitiram o pagamento. Por favor, confira o valor na DM que lhe enviamos hoje. Atenciosamente

@Mutant6330 Hello Dan, we are sorry to read this, we inform you that in line with the current regulation of the Spanish government, we are attached to the regulations of the country's authorities. Regard

@rb2676 Hola Cave, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us all details by DM including your booking information, code, ticket number and registered email? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@nrdavid04 Naomi, we have reviewed and responded to your direct messages. Let us know by that means in case of any doubt. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@reperfiled2 Hola. Estamos en espera de actualización por parte del área encargada sobre tu caso. Apenas nos brinden detalles te estamos comunicando. Agradecemos tu comprensión. Un saludo.
@reperfiled2 Hola. Disculpa la confusión con las fechas, hemos dado respuesta a tu DM. Un saludo.
@IberiaAir_sucks Hola, how can we help you? Please let us know all the details of your query by DM to review and tell you how to proceed. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@goforgin2 Hola, we have reviewed and see that the department in charge has already issued an official response to your complaint. If so, we couldn't tell you anything different from this department. Let us know by DM in case of any doubt. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@nrdavid04 Hola Naomi, we have requested additional information from you through our private conversation. Kind regards.
@ca10024947 Hola Elena, we confirm that we have recently requested an update on your case from the department in charge. We will notify you by DM as soon as we have an update. Kind regards.
@steve10016 Steve, we are sorry that we cannot indicate something different from this department. We ask you to try to upgrade directly at the counters. Kind regards.

@reperfiled2 Hola, te respondimos a través de nuestra conversación por mensaje directo solicitándote algunos detalles para continuar nuestro seguimiento a tu caso. Quedamos atentos a tu mensaje y continuamos por ese medio. Un saludo.
@steve10016 We're sorry for the inconvenience, Steve. You can try to upgrade during the check-in at the airport on the day of your flight. Kind regards.
@constanza_ruff Hola Constanza, when you make your booking the system takes into account the time to transport from terminal to terminal, we understand you will have enough time, regards.
@kadielicious Hola, please send us a screenshot of those emails via DM so we can verify this for you, thanks.
@thanachoter Hola Thanachote, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name, email address and claim reference number https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@RebelTechIm spanish embassy or consulate for further details. Kind regards

data.text: @RebelTechIm Hola Jack, sorry for any inconvenience. Notice that masks are still mandatory on flights from/to Spain, what's no longer mandatory is the mask use inside the airport, but during the flight all passengers must wear a mask when flying from/to Spain. Please contact the/1
@SephCuisine Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you send us a DM with your full name, email address and the claim reference number? https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@steve10016 Sorry, Steve. We've replied your new DMs. Regards

@kadielicious Hola, our colleagues sent you an email two days ago asking for the receipts. Until now, you only sent us one receipt (7,50 euros). Could you please reply to our colleagues' email and make sure to attach all receipts?
@steve10016 We've just replied your DMs. Please check
@Melmci4 In this case, unfortunately, you won't be able to transfer Avios between BA and Iberia, as both accounts must be older than 90 days. Sorry

@steve10016 Hola Steve, sorry to read this. If the flight departs in less than 24h, only our colleagues at the airport will be able to assist you. If that's not the case, please send us a DM with your full name and booking code https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Bargain Loving Brits in the Sun
entity.description: Following Brits who have relocated to popular holiday destinations. In their search for sun, fun and low costs, the characters featured on the show reveal why they have chosen to move abroad. In the Costa del Sol, Jo and Jan were so impacted by the lives of homeless dogs that they have set up their own rescue shelter, but it needs sixty thousand euros a year to stay open. Sixty kilometres inland lives retired Yorkshire policewoman Sas, who has brought her beloved chip pan with her, but needs to sell enough shoes on her market to be able to afford her car repairs.

data.text: @Melmci4 clear the browser's memory cache or try to combine the Avios once again with a different browser or device. Another option is to transfer the Avios by accessing your British Airways account or contacting the Iberia Plus Centre over the phone 900 201 214 (from Spain);/2

data.text: @Melmci4 Hola Melanie. In order to transfer Avios between British Airways and Iberia, both accounts must be individual, registered under the exact same personal details (name, email, postal address, etc) and have more than 3 months old. If your accounts meet all requirements, please /1
@RickF645 Hola Rick, we're sorry to read this. May we assist you with a specific query? If so, please send us a DM with more details https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

urls.title: Reclamaciones sobre el servicio - Iberia
urls.description: En nuestro centro de atención al cliente disponemos de un servicio de reclamaciones Iberia en el que responderemos a todas tus quejas y sugerencias

data.text: @AFGA18 Hola Angel, lamentamos leer lo que nos comentas. Entendemos que abriste la reclamación a través del formulario https://t.co/waZL0xA5Ai; si es así, envíanos por MD (https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE) el número de caso (E********-********) para así poder verificar internamente. Saludos.
@hankberryy33 You're very welcome 😉

data.text: @hankberryy33 Hola, we're glad to read that you enjoyed your meal and the flight experience with us. We can't wait to welcome you onboard many times more 😀

@Danny7Gallagher Hola Danny, we're sorry for the inconvenience and would like to offer our apologies. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...) https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@ErimelT En cuanto nos respondan, te contamos. Un saludo.
@domroch Hola Dom, thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM, we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@ErimelT Hola, te hemos enviado un MD. Saludos

@pfonseca2016 Hola Paulo, we are sorry for the inconvenience, we suggest you to delete your personal information from the public message and share us all details by DM . Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@JohnIrish147 Hola John, thank you for contacting us, could you please share us all booking information by DM, code, ticket number and registered email? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

urls.title: Non-recorded Avios - Iberia
urls.description: Log in to easily claim any Avios and Elite Points you have earned but that are not yet recorded in your Iberia Plus account

data.text: @jake_savin Hola Jake, thank you for contacting us, you can request for non credited Avios for your flights through this link: https://t.co/cBqg7JCauS . Any question, please tell us by DM all details. Kind regards https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@RAK03 Hola, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM with all details. Any question, please share us your booking details by DM to verify . Regards
@efdezrios1 Hola, sentimos leer lo que comentas, indícanos por DM detalles de tu solicitud. Saludos
@nrdavid04 Hello, Naomi. We're sorry you got that impression. We have responded to the last comment you posted. We will be attentive to your response. Kind regards.
@nrdavid04 Hello. We are very sorry for what you tell us. please send us a DM with all the details of your case. Kind regards.
@SergioR88038534 Hola Sergio, envíanos un mensaje directo https://t.co/HyIAB652lE con tu código de reserva y nombre completo para que podamos revisar internamente. Saludos.
@_b3x Hola, sorry for the delay. We've just replied your DMs
@BernadetteMatia Hola Bernadette, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your claim reference number, full name and email address https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@wanderlustcalls You're welcome :)
@wanderlustcalls Hola, we've just replied to your DMs. Please check
@Pddy1 Please send us a DM with the original booking code, ticket number (075...) and clarify what was the payment method used to purchase the original booking https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@Pddy1 Hola, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with an email address so we can send the refund receipt https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@katefroehlich46 Thanks, Kate
@TopaGuru Hola Vasu, pelase send us the details by DM and we will gladly help you. Kind regards.

data.text: @spavlov2002 Hola Stefan. The Golf clubs should be securely inside the bag to ensure that they don't inconvenience or injure other passengers during boarding, carriage and landing. You will need to contact our booking area so they can inform you on how to proceed https://t.co/wYJTpfuyUI
@OFarrellSimon We'll reply, Simon. Please send us the DM
@OFarrellSimon Sorry to read this. In order to assist you, we really need you to send us the required information via DM. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@OFarrellSimon Hola Simon, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name, email address, IBPlus number and the claim reference code https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@brittanyy_lee10 Hola Brittany, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please send us a DM with your full name, claim reference number and email address? https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@jaquezbilingual Hola Jessica, we're sorry to read this. In case you need further assistance, please send us a DM with your PIR reference number, full name and email address https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@katefroehlich46 Hola Kate, please send us the details by DM and we will check this internally. Regards.

data.text: @ca10024947 Please delete the tweet where you wrote the PIR reference number and the claim reference code. We kindly ask you to avoid posting this kind of info on public chats
@orpheus_chick Thank you!
@shugert Hola Samuel, in this case you should contact with AA to add the benefits of your original fare. Regards
@orpheus_chick Hola Kirstin, depends of the fare conditions, could you send us your booking code by DM to check? Thank you.
@achraf_bakkali Hola Achraf, did you made the report at the airport? Please let us know by DM. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@lisacopeduflock Hola Lisa, Please give us the details of your booking by DM, we will try to help you from here. Regards.
@ThaisRodmoro Hola Thais, tendremos en cuenta tu comentario, facilítanos detalles de tu vuelo por DM para poder comprobar el retraso. Gracias
@ThaisRodmoro Hola Thais, sentimos los inconvenientes ocasionados, quedamos a tu disposición para cualquier consulta adicional. Saludos
